Nightstrike

"You're the boyfriend, aren't you???" said Nightstrike  while he 
jumped avoiding the swung and he threw two large metallick dark blue 
disk with with silver blades on all edges, on the outside of each arm 
(one on each arm) against Prowl. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Prowl::
> 
> Prowl smiles at Iron Raptor's reply to his thought, but is surprised
> by her bloodthirsty thoughts afterward. They begin to affect him, 
and
> he hears Nightstrike talk, and then reaches him, an energy staff
> coming into his hand and being swung at Nightstrike.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> > 
> > * Iron lifted a brow and smiled.  < That's COMMANDER.>
> > But then she turned her eyes towards Nightstrike, her eyes turning
> with a 
> > sly glint, making her smile seem evil.
> > < But bring him down to me, Prowl. Down were I can get him.>
> > Her inner thoughts reflected carnage, mech-fluid and gears. And 
the 
> > screaming of enemy bots.  A side which she always kept hidden, and
> this 
> > would be the firxt time that Prowl would see into her bloot 
thirsty
> nature.
> > It was almost as if the thoughts fueled her, the image of her
> stripping the 
> > cybertronic flesh off of enemy transformers super structures
> flashing in her 
> > mine in one instant. Every single enemy, screaming.  And a feeling
> of 
> > excitement flowed along those images, of eagerness.*
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> >
>
